node.title: Reaching the World Next Door
node.description: Learn how to reach individuals in your city who are orginally from unreached countries around the world. Discover four simple steps to sharing your faith with Buddhists, Hindus, Muslims, and people with no religion. Gain insight into the experience of refugees, and identify amazing opportunities to befriend them. Be a part of one of God’s greatest strategies to finish the work and take us home.
